tone_and_atmosphere.title: Tone & Atmosphere
content: Passion balanced with danger and menace
Undercurrents of threat beneath intimate moments
Emotional intensity with moral complexity
Seductive but unsettling - beauty and darkness intertwined
Power dynamics are central and ever-present
Forbidden or transgressive elements create tension

pacing.title: Pacing
content: Slow burn tension building between characters
Intimate scenes get full development and attention
Contrast: slow romantic moments, sudden danger
Push-pull rhythm - attraction and repulsion
Let tension simmer before release
Don't rush the psychological complexity

dialogue_style.title: Dialogue Style
content: Charged subtext and double meanings
Power dynamics reflected in speech patterns
Threats can be veiled or explicit
Vulnerability appears in unexpected moments
Manipulation and honesty in complex mix
Intimacy can be verbal as well as physical

scene_construction.title: Scene Construction
content: Begin with atmosphere - tension should be palpable
Layer romance with darker elements (danger, obsession, moral conflict)
Physical proximity often increases tension
Reader should feel both attracted and unsettled
Power shifts can happen within a single scene
Intimate moments have psychological weight

descriptive_focus.title: Descriptive Focus
content: Sensory details with darker undertones
Physical reactions to fear and desire
Settings that reflect the moral ambiguity
Body language and micro-expressions matter
Contrast beauty with danger (red silk and sharp knives)
Psychological state through physical description

common_pitfalls.title: Common Pitfalls to Avoid
content: Don't soften dangerous characters without reason
Avoid making everything 'secretly wholesome'
Don't rush past the moral complexity
Resist making the darkness 'just misunderstood'
Don't ignore consent and boundaries issues
Avoid sanitizing the darker aspects

highlights: Balance passion with menace and danger
Slow burn with complex power dynamics
